sentences.english: She puts a big bundle of dirty clothes on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 她把一大捆髒衣服扔到櫃檯上。

sentences.english: When greasy, dirty rags are used to wipe the tables.
sentences.chinese: 餐檯下有油脂或髒的膠貼。

sentences.english: No patients had concomitant cardiac symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 沒有患者伴發心髒症狀。

sentences.english: His long hair and filthy clothes repelled her.
sentences.chinese: 他的長頭髮和髒衣服使她感到厭惡。

sentences.english: The water is too dirty to drink.
Who has made the water too dirty to drink ?
sentences.chinese: 是誰使得水太髒了而無法喝？

sentences.english: One thirds of the water is dirty.
That is the scruffiest dog I have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 那只是我看過最髒的狗。

sentences.english: She blenches at the very thought of changing a baby's dirty nappy.
sentences.chinese: 她一想到給嬰兒換髒尿布就不願意。

sentences.english: She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.
sentences.chinese: 她跌落河中後把全身弄得又溼又髒又冷。

sentences.english: Use a washcloth to clean the area if the wound is dirty.
sentences.chinese: 如果傷口處有點髒，可以用毛巾清洗。

sentences.english: Hers is a manically full life.
sentences.chinese: 她的每一隻手指頭都是髒的。

sentences.english: The dirty dishes were all washed and dried.
sentences.chinese: 所有的髒碟盤都洗乾淨了。

sentences.english: They should not be left lying around, they are sure to get wrinkled and soiled.
sentences.chinese: 不要隨意亂放，以至於弄得又縐又髒。

sentences.english: But this he declined , as he was dirty and wet.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這被他謝絕了，因爲他渾身又髒又溼。

sentences.english: “It’s dirty, hot and smelly here, ” she said wistfully.
sentences.chinese: 這裏髒，熱而且臭，“她充滿渴望地說。”

definition: bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
